content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. To get started with booking your plumbing service, may I have your full name, please?
Hi, my name is George Martin.
Thanks, George. Can you please provide the address where the plumbing service is needed?
Got it. Just a moment while I confirm your location is within our service area.
You're within our service area. When would be an ideal time for our technician to come by? Please provide day and approximate time.
Well, I'm not exactly sure, maybe sometime late afternoon or early evening?
I'm sorry, I didn't quite understand the time you mentioned. Could you please specify a more precise time frame or a particular hour?
It's just that my days are unpredictable. Can't really pin down an exact time.
I understand, George. Unfortunately, we do need a more specific time to schedule your appointment. Would mornings between 8 and 10, or afternoons between 1 and 3 work better for you?
I really can't commit right now. Maybe I'll call back later when I have a clearer schedule.
reason: Customer unable to provide ideal time
